Class ChessGameDM

java.lang.Object
persist.ADataMapper<ChessGame>
persist.ChessGameDM
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDataMapper<ChessGame>
public class ChessGameDM extends ADataMapper<ChessGame>
Class responsible for the persistence of a ChessGame instance
Author:
Joaquim Simoes, nº54599, Diogo Mateus, nº53374

    • createGame

      public static ChessGame createGame(ChessPlayer p1, ChessPlayer p2, Date startDate)
      This function will persist and create a ChessGame given two players
      Parameters:
      p1 - ChessPlayer one, will be the white pieces
      p2 - ChessPlayer two, will be the black pieces
      Returns:
      Returns the ChessGame after being persisted
